This is a testharness.js-based test.
[FAIL] task to fire selectionchange event gets queued each time selection is mutated
  assert_equals: expected 2 but got 3
[FAIL] has scheduled selectionchange event is set to false at the beginning of a task to fire selectionchange event
  assert_equals: expected 1 but got 0
Harness: the test ran to completion.
